description: Tis the season for gingerbread. Spread the holiday cheer with this soft, moist gingerbread cake topped with peaches and drizzled in caramel sauce.
keywords: Spiced Gingerbread Cake With White Peaches
name: Spiced Gingerbread Cake With White Peaches Recipe | Woolworths

recipeInstructions.text: Place remaining butter and remaining dark brown sugar in a large non-stick frying pan. Cook over low heat for 5 minutes or until sugar dissolves. Add cream. Increase heat. Bring to the boil. Reduce heat, simmer for 5 minutes or until thick. Cool. (Mixture will thicken.) Top cake with peaches. Pour caramel over cake just before serving.

Place remaining butter and remaining dark brown sugar in a large non-stick frying pan. Cook over low heat for 5 minutes or until sugar dissolves. Add cream. Increase heat. Bring to the boil. Reduce heat, simmer for 5 minutes or until thick. Cool. (Mixture will thicken.) Top cake with peaches. Pour caramel over cake just before serving.

Reduce heat, simmer for 5 minutes or until thick. Cool. (Mixture will thicken.) Top cake with peaches. Pour caramel over cake just before serving.
